definition: to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud

sentences.english: Cover the wok, and braise for 10 minutes over medium low heat until the potatoes are quite tender.
sentences.chinese: 盖上镬盖，以中低火焖10分钟直至薯仔较腍身。

sentences.english: Steam the taro then mash it. Mix with coconut milk and boil.
sentences.chinese: 荔芋蒸腍压烂，与椰汁拌匀煮滚。

sentences.english: Turn to low heat and cook the ribs until tender and sauce thickened, dish up and serve.
sentences.chinese: 转最小火焖至肋排腍而汁料收稠便可上碟。

definition: to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
to braise/to cook in soy and vinegar/braised/cooked in soy and vinegar
variant of 羹[geng1], used in restaurants and night markets in Taiwan
lit. just the right flavor/just right/just the thing/excellent
to stew in soy sauce and spices
